abstract: Victoria Azarenka beats Johanna Konta, 6-4, 6-2, at Miami Open to advance to semifinals; other tennis news noted.

headline.main: Victoria Azarenka Makes Miami Open Semifinals

snippet: Azarenka advanced to the semifinals of the Miami Open by defeating Johanna Konta, 6-4, 6-2, on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Azarenka advanced to the semifinals of the Miami Open by defeating Johanna Konta, 6-4, 6-2, on Wednesday.
